Acceptance of Evolution & and Old Earth Equates to Atheism.

post_info.post_title: Acceptance of Evolution & and Young Earth Equates to Atheism

Well no, as the first two conditions are totally irrelevant to whether or not one believes in a deity.
 
 Evolution =/= atheism.
 
 Old earth (ie geology)* =/= atheism.
 
 Theism =/= literal interpretation of scripture.
 
 * Instead of using the phrase "old earth" why not just use "geology"? This is another loaded term which implies that there is a 'controversy' where none exists.
